column4: MaleDraconis dont take my word 100% but im sure openoffice doesnt run macros from Microsoft Office packages
thanks, I figured as much too..  Do you know of a prog that might run it?  or does Wine work well with Excel?

I dont know of a program native to linux which will run Macros from Excel. There is a paid program called "Softmaker 2010" which is apparently very compatible with microsoft office but i dont know if it runs macros yet its last version didnt

joshlegs, update manager is one of the problems...  I'm getting this error anytime I try to install or update anything: 'E:Malformed line 55 in source list /etc/apt/sources.list (dist parse), E:The list of sources could not be read
